altername_name: Jewel Bem Hunter Lime with Paint Maker
name: Houma Hunter Lime with Paint Maker
overview: Once upon a month, a door behind the full moon opens. This door is between the human world and magical world. Now it just so happens that on one such night, Lime and Bass are in hot pursuit of a demon who had stolen six power gems from the magical world. The demon escapes to the human world through the open door, and the two follow. Houma Hunter Lime with Paint Maker is a collection of 3 different stories & other one that will be unlocked playing the first 3 ones, the game also features a colletion of images, music and even a colouring drawing game.
